text: is a Japanese politician. He was born in Nanto, Toyama, Japan. He was elected to the Diet in 1969, as a member of the Liberal Democratic Party.Watanuki's official website (dead link) He was Speaker of the House of Representatives from July 2000 to November 2003.An article in the Japan Times. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the House of Representatives (Japan) Category:People from Toyama Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Tamisuke Watanuki
